formSection.contact: Do you want to contact us?
formSection.contactDescription: Submit this form and we will contact you as soon as possible.

follow.title: Follow us on social networks!
follow.description: Use our social networks to stay updated and get in touch with us.

header.title: High Quality Computer Engineering
header.description: Development of applications and solutions with high quality and performance standards

spinner.responseOK: Your request has been sent successfully. We will contact you to provide more information.
spinner.responseKO: Seems that something went wrong, please try again later.

experience.title: Years of experience
experience.description: We have more than 15 years of experience, providing us with great knowledge to apply in the projects.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: On every project that we start, we study all the new technologies in order to give the best solution.

restless.title: Restless mind
restless.description: Our way of work drive us to fight for each project, triying to improve the product and ourselves.

introductionCard.title: Bring your company to the next level
introductionCard.description: Our approach is like an empty canvas. We analyze the customer's real requirements and search for optimum technological solutions, bringing a high quality product.

technologiesCard.title: Technologies, languages and frameworks
technologiesCard.description: Due to our restless spirit, we have always the mind open to learn, study and apply new technologies. If you add our present knowledge about a lot of these, you will bring the perfect combination.

pages.error: Ups, seems that something went wrong!
